description: Try our easy to follow Pulled Beef Stuffed Capsicums recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Stuffed capsicum,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Beef,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Rice,Spinach,Peanut free
name: Pulled Beef Stuffed Capsicums Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Halve capsicums from top to bottom. Remove seeds and trim membranes. Place into a shallow baking dish. Drizzle with oil and season to taste.
Combine rice and quinoa, meat and spinach in a bowl. Add 1 cup of the cheese and stir well to combine.
Fill capsicums with mixture. Top with remaining cheese. Bake for 30 minutes until golden.
